mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Route ( user_id, route_name, start_time, end_time, duration, distance, calories, points ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{duration}, #{distance}, #{calories}, #{points, typeHandler=com.ttuikong.spring.typehandler.RoutePointsTypeHandler} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, route_name, start_time, end_time, distance, duration, points, calories, created_at FROM Route WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, user_id, route_name, start_time, end_time, distance, duration, calories, points, created_at FROM Route WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
